chart_description: This chart displays the rate at which the live rows are fetched by Scans from a Postgres database table.

dimension_descriptions.index: This dimension represents the index of the table being scanned. It helps to analyze which index is being scanned and whether it is optimal for the query. A high number of scans on a single index may indicate a need to create a new index, while no scans on an existing index may indicate that the index is not being utilized effectively.
